full_summary:
# Tender Notice: Dust Removal Corrections to Building 76 at AAFC Sherbrooke RDC

## Table of Contents
- [Notice Summary](#notice-summary)
- [Tender Details](#tender-details)
- [Background Information](#background-information)
- [Site Visit Information](#site-visit-information)
- [Key Contact Information](#key-contact-information)
- [References](#references)

## Notice Summary
The Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) intends to select a contractor to undertake dust removal corrections to building 76 at the Sherbrooke Research and Development Center (Sherbrooke RDC). The scope of work involves the replacement of the existing dust collection system in the animal feed preparation sector of the dairy complex.

## Tender Details
- **Tender Title**: Dust Removal Corrections to Building 76 at AAFC Sherbrooke RDC
- **Tender Reference**: cb-740-97160319 (cb-740 Added with Amendment 5 on 04 Apr 2024)
- **Solicitation Number**: 01B46-2024-010
- **Notice Date**: 2024-02-20
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-04-04 14:00:00
- **Tender Status**: Expired
- **Procurement Category**: CNST (Construction and Service Related to Construction)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

## Background Information
A replacement of the existing dust collection system is required. The new system is to be more powerful and offer additional collection points. Additionally, a partial dismantling of the secondary system including fan replacement is foreseen.

## Site Visit Information
A site visit has been scheduled for February 28, 2024 at 10h00. Interested bidders are to meet at the Sherbrooke Research and Development Center (2000 Collège Street, Sherbrooke, J1M 0C8).

## Key Contact Information
- Name: Jean-François Lemay
- Email: jean-francois.lemay@agr.gc.ca
- Phone: (343) 571-9706

## References
 completo reference scheme and/or sought references.
